One was younger than me, the other one was older than me, wasn't allowed to go out, wasn't allowed to do anything.

My father was saying, if you don't want to do anything, no problem, just pull up or something and have a lie down.
That was his attitude about freedom for me. And yet my brothers, they were out all the time, which made me very jealous.
